Performance:
October 1977: The Two Butterflies

Production: October 1977

Play: The Two Butterflies (双蝶々曲輪日記)

Scenes:

The Sumo Arena at Horie (堀江相撲場 / Horie sumōba)

The Rice Shop at Daihojimachi (大宝寺町米屋 / Daihojimachi komeya)

The Fighting at Nambaura (難波裏喧嘩 / Nambaura kenka)

The Town of Hashimoto (橋本 / Hashimoto)

The Skylight (八幡里引窓 / Yawata-no sato hikimado)

Characters:

Chogoro Nuregami (Nuregami Chōgorō / 濡髪長五郎)

Tea stall proprietor (Chamise teishu / 茶店亭主)

Chokichi Hanaregoma (Hanaregoma Chōkichi / 放駒長吉)

Oseki (Ane Oseki / 姉お関)

Geta-no-Ichi (Geta no Ichi / 下駄の市)

Node-no-San (Node no San / 野手の三)

Rokubei (Dōgyō Rokubei / 同行六兵衛)

Myorin (Ama Myōrin / 尼妙林)

Gonzaemon Hiraoka (Hiraoka Gōzaemon / 平岡郷左衛門)

Ariemon Mihara (Mihara Ariemon / 三原有右衛門)

Yogoro Yamazaki (Yamazaki Yogorō / 山崎与五郎)

Azuma (Fujiya Azuma / 藤屋吾妻)

Oteru (Yome Oteru / 嫁お照)

Oyoshi (Gejo Oyoshi / 下女およし)

Jimbei (Kagokaki Jinbei / 駕籠舁甚兵衛)

Tasuke (Kagokaki Tasuke / 駕籠舁太助)

Jibuemon Hashimoto (Hashimoto Jibuemon / 橋本治部右衛門)

Yojibei Yamazaki (Yamazaki Yojibei / 山崎与次兵衛)

Shohachi, a senior employee (Tedai Shōhachi / 手代庄八)

Junior employee (Decchi / 丁稚)

Ohaya (Nyōbō Ohaya / 女房お早)

Chogoro's mother (Chōgorō haha (Jūjibei haha) / 長五郎母(十次兵衛母))

Jujibei Nampo (Nanpō Jūjibei / 南方十次兵衛)

Tampei Hiraoka (Hiraoka Tanpei / 平岡丹平)

Denzo Mihara (Mihara Denzō / 三原伝蔵)

Buddhist devotee (Dōgyōshū / 同行衆)
